page.title: 04FAMILY LIFE 1.
page.content: ONE OF OUR FAMILIES. Our family consists of myself, my husband, our two daughters aged 9 and 6 and my Mother-in-Law. We are what I think would be called a middle class family. We live in a detached house in a small village of approximately 250 inhabitants called Kenardington near Ashford in Kent. Our house is an old beamed house, part of it dating back to the 16th. century. It used to be two cottages but approximately thirty years ago it was converted into a single dwelling. We have lived here now for eight years. We have three bedrooms upstairs, a lounge with an open inglenook fireplace and a sitting room also with with an inglenook fireplace downstairs.
